title: Custom HUD and Skins
body:
So a friend recently told me about custom skins (lolskin preview) and HUDS. I was wondering if they were legal. I searched this up and i found mixed answers some said that a rioter said that they are allowed as long as they dont influence gameplay, some said they got banned (in NA and EUW)

I kinda dont want to get banned therefore, as the title says.. Will i get banned using custom skins and custom HUDS.

for example using godfist leesin as appose to original and using a Diamond themed HUD.

Thanks in advance,
